description: This hallway is apparently one of the roots of the tree hollowed out.  The hall
leads south to a room where you hear strange noises or you can go up the steps.
6154.name: Underground hallway

description: the steps appear like they will hold your weight.
the hallway looks quite grand.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
To the east the ancient grey giants have many marks as if something with huge
claws has been tearing at them in rage.
The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.
You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient,
grey trees loom everywhere.  The trail continues south and west.  A broad
irregular path leads eastwards away from the trail.
6136.name: Dusty trail in the deep, dark forest

description: The trees standing on the sides of the path have scratch marks on them.
The dusty trail leads west through the trees.
The dusty trail leads south through the trees.
The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  To the south a
fast river is flowing westwards through the forest.  Ancient grey trees loom on
both banks.  The path continues north and west.
6048.name: On the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west and to the south,
a frail path leads away from the trail.
6108.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The tall trees are young and slender, not much more than a hundred years or so.
You are on a small path leading through the forest.  A path leads north to a
small field and other paths lead east and west into the dense forest.
6018.name: Intersection in the light forest

description: The path leads north to a small, grassy field.
The path leads east to a dense part of the forest.
The path leads west to a dense part of the forest.
The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey
trees loom everywhere.  To the south you smell marsh gas.  The path continues
north and east.
6125.name: Small path on the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
A small dirt road stretches into the Haon'Dor Forest, cutting a
straight path through the trees growing.  The road stretches a good
distance south, but the end of it can be seen, a dead end.  A few
smaller roads lead off of this main road.
6038.name: {&The Small Dirt Road{x

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The forest trail winds east-west through the trees.
The young, slender trees look beautiful, their fresh, green leaves moving
lightly in the wind.
You are on a narrow trail leading east and west through the forest.
To the west, the forest gradually becomes more dense.  A small forest
path leads south, and a courtyard is just visible to the north.
6002.name: Trail through the light forest

description: You see a beautiful courtyard.
The trail continues eastwards through the young trees.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards into the dense forest.
The small path leads south through the young trees.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
The stakes keep the logs from rolling down.
Even though the logs have been chopped to shorter pieces, they are quite heavy
as they are fresh and still filled with sap.
There are more stumps than logs and some of the stumps are partly covered in
moss.
You are in a clearing in the forest.  Lots of fresh stumps of varying sizes
protrude from the ground and heavy logs are stacked neatly in a big pile
supported by stakes set into the ground.  Paths lead north, east and west.
6008.name: Forest clearing

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.
Unnnrrrragh!  Made It!  You have managed to squirm through the narrowest
part of the tunnel and into a larger section.  You certainly can hear music
coming from the north now...  {^H{6a{^r{6p {^M{6u{^s{6i{^c{0 in fact...
6025.name: Strange Tunnel

description: You slip beneath the tall grasses and into a large hole dug into the
ground, you scan the room and find it empty save for the occasional
earthworm, it appears to have been recently dug, and not by any animal...  A
small tunnel has been dug to the north from which you think you hear faint
music...  If only you can squeeze through...
6024.name: Hole in the Field

description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient, grey trees seem to
observe you silently you from all sides.  Paths lead north, east and west.
6117.name: Junction in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6035.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  To the south a
fast river is flowing westwards through the forest.  Ancient grey trees loom on
both banks.  The path continues north and west.
6120.name: On the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
It covers a ground area corresponding to an irregular circle with a diameter of
about 20 feet and is nearly 10 feet tall.  It looks very old.
The immense spider web moves softly.
You are balancing carefully on the giant sticky threads that holds the giant
web in place.  To the east is a giant tree trunk and to the west is an entrance
to a cave-like structure made from many layers of spider web.
6133.name: On the spider web

description: The web continues to the north.
To the east is the giant tree trunk.
To the west is the entrance to the cave-like structure.
You feel as if they are watching you.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Huge, ancient
trees are on all sides.  The path continues north and south.
6119.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues east and west.
6013.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.
A large brick room opens up, as a large machine stands in the
middle.  A long leather belt stretches out the front of the machine,
with a large, razor sharp blade attached to a shaft, in the middle of
the belt.  The shaft goes outside the northern wall, to a large paddle
wheel in the river.  A large Makou Engine is also connected to the
shaft.  The smell of burning wood, and sawdust hover around in the
air.  When the machine is running, nothing can be heard except the
machine itself.
6041.name: The {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {7S{&aw {7M{&ill {Y[{RWORK -N- ROOM{Y]

description: The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
Some of the trunks to the west are covered in a thin, almost transparent
substance.  It looks like small threads woven carefully together.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees that stand
close on all sides.  The trail leads east and south.  To the north, a narrow
path leads away from the trail.
6110.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path leads west between the giant trees.
The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be
heard - everything is ominously quiet.
6102.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  To the south a
fast river is flowing westwards through the forest.  Ancient grey trees loom on
both banks.  The path continues north and west.
6050.name: On the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest floor in an unreal twilight illumination.  Paths
lead north, east and south.
6012.name: Intersection in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees
that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is
ominously quiet.
6109.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
The path winds east-west through the forest of Haon'Dor.  To the
north however, another path branches off into a small valley.  In the
distance many trees can be seen, however..  They are not living.  All
is ominously quiet here, as quiet as the dead.
6128.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The path is probably used by the cabin's inhabitants.
The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.
It looks simple but comfortable and the slender trees make the whole place seem
pretty idyllic.  It's a cabin built from logs.  Wooden logs, not system logs.
You are outside a small cabin built entirely from heavy logs.  There is a
wooden door to the north and small paths lead west and south through the trees.
6009.name: Outside a small cabin in the forest

description: The wooden door is quite sturdy but does not appear to be equipped with a lock.
The small path leads west through the light forest.
The small path leads south through the dense forest.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way north-south between huge, ancient
trees that loom ominously above you.
6111.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to
become lighter to the west.  The path continues north and west.
6017.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey
trees loom all around you.  The path continues north and east.
6107.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The grassy plains widen as the open area can be seen.  A high mountain
approaches closer to the west where a small cave is in view now.  To the
south, rows of trees and a small river can be seen while the forest is seen
to the east.
6157.name: Open path away from the forest

description: The sticky substance is hanging like ropes between the ancient trees, crossing
the path just out of reach.  It might be possible to climb one of the sticky
trunks.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way westwards just below huge sticky
wires suspended like ropes between the trees.  To the west the path seems to
be completely covered in a giant web made from huge threads covered with glue.
This place gives you the creeps.
6130.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest, away from the web.
The structure to the west looks most of all like an immense spider web.
It does not look as if you can go further without getting caught in it.
Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6033.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees standing
close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west, and to the south a frail
path leads away from the trail.
6126.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  To the south a
fast river is flowing westwards through the forest.  Ancient grey trees loom on
both banks.  The path continues north and west.
6049.name: On the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a narrow trail winding its way between the enormous,
grey trunks.  The crowns of the trees must be very dense, as they
leave the forest floor in utter darkness.  The trail leads east and
west.
6100.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow trail leads east to a somewhat lighter part of the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides.  The trail leads east and south.
6127.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Giant, grey
trees loom ominously on all sides.  The path continues east and south.
6116.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
A small dirt road stretches into the Haon'Dor Forest, cutting a
straight path through the trees growing.  The road stretches a good
distance south, but the end of it can be seen, a dead end.  A few
smaller roads lead off of this main road.
6026.name: {&The Small Dirt Road{x

description: A small dirt road stretches into the Haon'Dor Forest, cutting a
straight path through the trees growing.  The road stretches a good
distance south, but the end of it can be seen, a dead end.  A few
smaller roads lead off of this main road.
6039.name: {&The Small Dirt Road{x

description: It is definitely not the most comfortable bed you have seen in your life.
A heavy table that doesn't even appear to rock.
It is made from oak and looks strong and sturdy.
You are inside a small one-room cabin made entirely from heavy logs.  It is
very sparsely furnished, containing only most basic housekeeping equipment,
such as a bed, a chair and a table.
6010.name: Inside the cabin

description: The wooden door leads south.
A large brick room opens up, as a large machine stands in the
middle.  A long leather belt stretches out the front of the machine,
with a large, razor sharp blade attached to a shaft, in the middle of
the belt.  The shaft goes outside the northern wall, to a large paddle
wheel in the river.  A large Makou Engine is also connected to the
shaft.  The smell of burning wood, and sawdust hover around in the
air.  When the machine is running, nothing can be heard except the
machine itself.
6045.name: The {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {7S{&aw {7M{&ill {Y[{RWORK -S- ROOM{Y]

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The forest
gradually lightens to the east.  Paths lead east, west and south.
6007.name: Intersection in the dense forest

description: You can barely make out a clearing to the east.
The small path leads south through the trees.
A large brick building stands to the north, a singular smoke stack
rises above the roof and the surrounding trees.  Large glass windows
allow light to enter from the top of the ceilings.  To the east a
large platform stands, where chopped trees can be unloaded.  To the
west is an access road, the main road in and out of the saw mill.
6028.name: Outside The {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {7S{&aw {7M{&ill{x

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.
6020.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads west through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey
trees loom in all directions.  The path continues south and west.
6113.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
This is the small break room of the saw mill.  Here workers come
between shifts and working to relax, eat their lunches and meals, and
sometimes catch a few winks of sleep.  There is a stove in one corner
of the room, and several peices of furniture around the floor.
6040.name: {gT{Ghe {gN{Gorthern {gB{Greak {gR{Goom{x

description: The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey
trees loom all around you.  The trail continues north and east.
6135.name: Dusty trail in the deep, dark forest

description: The dusty trail leads north through the trees.
The dusty trail leads east through the trees.
An grassy trail leads itself here from the west to the east as the forest
begins to spread out a bit.  The soft greeneries are visible to the east
while a distant cave can be seen farther west.
6156.name: Unused path in a quiet forest

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The forest trail seems almost fragile compared to the massive trunks.
The crowns of the old trees almost cut out all light.
You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.
To the west, the trees are so huge and their crowns so dense that
forest remains in total darkness.  A small path leads south through
the trees.
6004.name: Trail through the dense forest

description: The trail continues eastwards through the dense forest.
The narrow trail almost seems to disappear between the enormous trunks.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient grey trees tower above
you on all sides.  Paths lead north, east and west.
6114.name: Junction in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
This temple is built to some god that you don't worship.  It is a nice place
to visit but you feel very uncomfortable about spending much time here.
The wooden altar seems almost to glow as you enter the room.  The only exit is
the way you came in.
6155.name: Cultist temple

description: the hallway looks quite grand.
You are on a narrow trail winding its way between the enormous,
grey trunks.  The crowns of the trees must be very dense, as they
leave the forest floor in utter darkness.  The trail leads east and
west.
6053.name: The Haon'Dor Forest Trail

description: The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  The ancient
trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty roots.  To the
south a dark river flows from east to west.  The only exit appears to be west.
6124.name: Dead end path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The forest trail winds east-west through the trees.
The trees here are quite young and fresh.  They seem to accommodate many kinds
of birds, insects and other small animals.
Very cute little creatures, they seem to enjoy life.
You are on a trail leading through the forest.  To the east is the
forest edge and to the west, the trail leads further into the forest.
6001.name: Trail through the light forest

description: The trail continues eastwards out of the forest.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.
This trail looks much spookier than any other thats you have seen.  The usual
animal claw marks and bites on the trees are getting far and few between. The
trail continues north.
6150.name: Narrow trail

description: the narrow trail continues north.
the trail intersects the main forest path.
Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6036.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The cocoons are burst open as if something inside really wanted to get out.
They are at the size of a human head.
The sticky walls are covered with open cocoons.
You are inside a cave-like structure that seems to be made entirely from
countless layers of spider web.  Temperature and humidity is very high making
it hard to breathe the foul air that lingers here.  The walls are covered with
open cocoons.
6134.name: Den of the Queen Spider

description: Compared to this place the east exit looks inviting.
A small dirt road stretches into the Haon'Dor Forest, cutting a
straight path through the trees growing.  The road stretches a good
distance south, but the end of it can be seen, a dead end.  A few
smaller roads lead off of this main road.
[ SAWMILL ---> ]
6027.name: {&The Small Dirt Road{x

description: You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The
crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.  The path continues north and east.  To the west is a
small clearing surrounded by trees.
6055.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You stumble upon a small clearing.  The old trees lean inward here,
shadowing the ground in all places but the center where their wide
canopies cannot reach.  The forest path is to the east.
6006.name: A Small Clearing

description: The tall grass makes a nice hiding place for animals.
The trees form a close thicket.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
You are in a small, grassy field somewhere in the forest.  The tall grass
nearly reaches your waist, and the surrounding oaks and beeches form an almost
wall-like thicket on all sides of the field.  A small path leads south through
the trees.
6023.name: On a small, grassy field

description: The small path leads south in between the trees.
This is the small break room of the saw mill.  Here workers come
between shifts and working to relax, eat their lunches and meals, and
sometimes catch a few winks of sleep.  There is a stove in one corner
of the room, and several peices of furniture around the floor.
6044.name: {gT{Ghe {gS{Gouthern {gB{Greak {gR{Goom{x

description: Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6034.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: You have stepped inside of this hollowed tree.  From here steps lead down into
darkness or you can exit the tree by going west.
6153.name: Inside the great tree

description: the door is carved beautifully.
The steps look appear like they will hold your weight.
You are walking along the narrow path, ducking under the sticky ropes as you
advance...
A huge, poisonous spider drops from above!
A huge, poisonous spider drops from above!
A huge, poisonous spider drops from above!
The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You resist the poison!
The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You are poisoned!
The huge, poisonous spider stings you!  You are poisoned!
You've fallen, and you can't get up!!!!!
6131.name: Spider web

description: Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6031.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  The ancient
trees stand so close that the path disappears between the dusty roots.  To the
south a dark river flows from east to west.  The only exit appears to be east.
6121.name: Dead end path on the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Giant, grey
trees loom ominously all around.  The path continues east and south.
6122.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
A small dirt road stretches into the Haon'Dor Forest, cutting a
straight path through the trees growing.  The road stretches a good
distance south, but the end of it can be seen, a dead end.  A few
smaller roads lead off of this main road.
6030.name: {&The Small Dirt Road{x

description: The spider web stretches out to the west.  It looks as if it is possible to
walk on it.
You are hanging on the outside of a huge tree trunk covered in a sticky
substance.  Directly to the west is an immense spider web suspended between
numerous of the giant trees including the one you are hanging on.
6132.name: Up in the tree

description: To the west is the immense spider web.  It seems to move softly.
Downwards is the narrow forest path.
Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6042.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: A large raised platform stands, sticking out of the saw mill
building to the north.  Massive iron railings stand, propped for an
airship to dock, and unload the logs it is carring.  The logs roll
downwards into a neat pile, and then are dragged into the saw mill for
final processing.
6029.name: The {RT{rree {RD{rrop-{RO{rff {RD{rocks{x

description: Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6043.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are fairly young, not much more than a hundred years or so.
You are on a small path leading through the forest.  The trees are tall
and slender.  A dirt path makes a trail from the north and south while an
unused trail leads westward.
6011.name: Small path through the light forest

description: The path leads north through the young trees.
The path leads south through the young trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient grey
trees loom all around you.  The path continues north and west.
6105.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The forest trail seems almost fragile compared to the massive trunks.
The dense crowns of the mature trees leave only a fraction of the sky to be
seen through the leaves.
You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.
To the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.
6003.name: Trail through the dense forest

description: The trail continues eastwards to the younger part of the forest.
You see the narrow trail winding westwards through the dense forest.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and south.
6005.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge, ancient trees
that stand close on all sides.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything is
ominously quiet.
6129.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest gradually
lightens to the north.  Paths lead north, east and west.
6014.name: Intersection in the dense forest

description: The path leads north to a lighter part of the forest.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The small path leads west through the trees.
You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.
To the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.
6051.name: The Haon'Dor Forest Trail

description: This area of the trail is also very peculiar.  You can see no signs of animal
life what so ever.  The structure of the surrounding trees forces the path to
make a sharp turn to the east.
6151.name: Narrow trail

description: the trail bends east.
the start of the trail.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues south and west.
6015.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads west through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  You feel as if
the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence.  The path continues north
and south.
6104.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
It consists mostly of gnawed bones mixed with small pieces of torn fur.
Kind of transparent, but quite noticeable nevertheless.
Quite uninteresting.
You are in a natural cave.  Various sorts of debris cover the stone floor,
emitting a rather unpleasant smell that makes the air thick and hard to
breathe.  The only obvious exit is east.
6022.name: Inside the cave

description: The cave opening is to the east.
The substance reminds you of giant threads covered with glue.  If it had not
been for the size you could have sworn it was part of a spider web.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient,
grey trees loom everywhere.  The tree trunks here seem to be covered in some
sticky substance.  The path continues south and west.
6144.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The trees are mostly old beeches and oaks.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The crowns of the
old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight illumination.  The path
continues north and south.
6016.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads south through the trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  You feel as
if the ancient trees observe you in watchful silence.  The path continues north
and west.
6115.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6032.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The irregular opening is eight feet wide and six feet tall.  An acrid smell
emanates from within.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  To the west there is
a cave entrance.  The path continues north and east.
6021.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees.
The cave is very dark.
The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way between huge, ancient trees
standing close on all sides.  The trail leads north and west and to the east,
a frail path leads away from the trail.
6112.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads north through the forest.
The path leads east - away from the trail.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The trees here seem to form a circle around a HUGE tree that is in the center
of them.  You notice a wooden door carved into the huge tree to the east.  The
trail that you followed to get here seems to end at the base of the tree.
6152.name: Circle of trees

description: A dark path through the forest.
The tree door is carved beautifully.
the bend on the trail.
The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.
The ancient grey giants have many marks as if something with huge claws has
been tearing at them in rage.
You are at the end of a broad, irregular path.  To the north is a very large
ominous-looking cave opening.  The trees here have many marks as if something
with huge claws has been tearing at them in rage.
6142.name: Outside a cave in the deep, dark forest

description: The disgusting smell of a large reptile emanates from the cave opening.
The path winds its way westwards.
You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.
To the east, the forest gradually seems to become lighter.
6054.name: Outside Westbridge Entering Haon'Dor Forest

description: The path seems fragile and unsafe compared to the enormous trunks that loom
around it.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are on a dusty trail winding its way east-west between huge,
ancient trees whose grey trunks remind you of ancient pillars in a
enormous, deserted hall.  To the south, a frail path leads away from
the trail.
6101.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads west through the forest.
The path leads south - away from the trail.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are on a narrow path leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient,
grey trees loom everywhere.  The path continues south and west.
6118.name: Small path in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.
The forest trail winds westwards through the trees.
The trees are quite tall considering most of them appear to be quite young.
On one of the trees, crude letters forming the word "Haon-Dor" have been
carved into the bark.
You are standing at the eastern edge of a big forest.  To the east
is the West Gate of Westbridge and to the west is a narrow trail,
leading in through the forest.  A dimly lit path leads north.
6000.name: Edge of the forest

description: You see a dimly lit path.
You see the narrow forest trail winding westwards in between the trees.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
You are on a dusty trail leading through the deep, dark forest.  Ancient
grey trees loom all around you.  You see a dark grove north of you.  The
only other exit is east and west.
6137.name: At the end of the trail through the deep, dark forest

description: The dusty trail leads east through the trees.
You are on a trail leading east and west through the dense forest.
To the west, the trees are so huge and their crowns so dense that
forest remains in total darkness.  A small path leads south through
the trees.
6052.name: The Haon'Dor Forest Trail

description: Surrounding the area are large old trees, growing since probably
the begining of time.  The sky above is almost totally blocked by the
canopy of leaves and limbs from the forest trees.  A few sounds echo
around the forest, the typical wildlife activities.  A few trees here
and there have a big red X painted on them.
6037.name: {GS{gouthwest {GH{gaon'{GD{gor {gForest{x

description: The narrow path is probably used by the animals living in the forest.
The crowns of the old trees leave the forest in an unreal twilight
illumination.
You are on a small path leading through the dense forest.  The forest seems to
become lighter to the east.  The path continues north and east.
6019.name: Small path in the dense forest

description: The small path leads north through the trees.
The small path leads east through the trees to a lighter part of the forest.
The river flows fast and strong.  It is black or looks so in the gloom.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
The ancient crowns of trees on both banks reach together forming a dense roof
above the dark river.
You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient, grey trees seem to
observe you silently you from all around.  To the south a dark river flows from
east to west through the forest.  Paths lead north, east and west.
6123.name: Junction on the river bank in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the north.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
These ancient trees must have been here for many, many years.  It is impossible
to catch even a glimpse of anything above the lowest branches.
The dark and dusty trail seems fragile compared to the massive trunks, and in
some places, giant grey roots have broken up through its surface.
You are where the dusty trail bends, as to avoid conflict with a
colossal trunk to the west.  Not a sound is to be heard - everything
is ominously quiet.  The trail leads east and south.
6103.name: Narrow trail through the deep, dark forest

description: You see a dark trail north.
The narrow, dusty trail leads east through the forest.
The narrow, dusty trail leads south through the forest.
The ancient grey giants seem to observe you silently.
The path seems all too frail.  One of the giant roots could probably crush it
in a single blow.
You are by a junction where three paths meet.  Ancient grey trees tower above
you on all sides.  Paths lead east, south and west.
6106.name: Junction in the deep, dark forest

description: The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the east.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the west.
The narrow path winds its way through the trees to the south.

This enormous winged serpent has dark green scales covering most of its
colossal body.  Numerous holes in its heavy wings tell of many fights as does
the nicks in the horns on its head.  It smells as disgusting as only dragons
do.
6112.room_name: The {mhuge{x, {ggr{Gee{gn dr{yag{gon{x is here, its narrow yellow eyes glowing with rage.
6112.name: the {mhuge{x, {ggr{Gee{gn dr{yag{gon{x~

description:
This little fellow is only three foot tall with wild matted brown hair and long
tangled brown beard.  He wears ragged brown and green clothing and looks as if
he is having great fun.
6115.room_name: Shargugh the Forest Brownie is here, grinning broadly at you.
6115.name: Shargugh~

description:
The druid looks quite old.  You would think him venerable, but you know
he would be a tough foe.
6116.room_name: The elder druid is here ... he looks very upset at your presence in his home.
6116.name: the elder druid~

description:
He is six feet tall and looks quite strong, muscles bulging under his heavy,
chequered shirt.  His features are worn with hard work and his expression is
one of a peaceful man leading a simple life.
6000.room_name: John the Lumberjack is here, looking for some trees to chop down.
6000.name: John the Lumberjack~

description:
This is a wild wolf, very similar to the tamed variety found in town,
though you don't want to pet this one. It is very dirty, smelly and probably
hungry.
6001.name: the {yw{ri{gl{yd {xwolf~

description:
The bear is a big, brown, furry animal with very large claws and very sharp
teeth.  It doesn't resemble those cute little thingies from toy shops at all.
6002.room_name: A big, brown, angry-looking bear is here.
6002.name: the brown bear~

description:
This small, furry creature with long ears and big feet has been attacked by
the dreaded rabbit rabies, a horrible disease that turns helpless and innocent
rabbits into ferocious and bloodthirsty monsters.
6003.room_name: A ferocious rabbit is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6003.name: the ferocious rabbit~

description:
She is a graceful creature on long, slender legs, and with large, brown eyes
looking back at you with an air of watchful interest.
6004.room_name: A fallow deer is grazing peacefully here.
6004.name: the fallow deer~

description: It is a large fox with beautiful, red-brown fur and a long, thick brush.
6005.room_name: A brown fox is here, looking for some rabbits to chew up.
6005.name: the brown fox~

description: The large, grey wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
6102.room_name: A large, grey wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6102.name: the large, grey wolf~

description: The large, black wolf eyes you with interest while licking its lips.
6103.room_name: A large, black wolf is here, glaring hungrily at you.
6103.name: the large, black wolf~

description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
6100.room_name: A vicious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6100.name: the vicious warg~

description:
It is an exceptionally large wolf with thick, black fur.  Saliva is dripping
quickly from its long, white fangs.  It looks quite dangerous and very angry.
6101.room_name: A ferocious warg is here, snarling angrily at you.
6101.name: the ferocious warg~
